checkERC7201().details: a function used as a reference to test if the getERC7201 is working correctly

getERC7201(string).details: a function to help get the bytes32 storage location following ERC7201 standard

params._namespace: a string that follows the ERC7201 namespace formatting

getRoleId(string).details: this function is used to get the bytes32 role id and is no way related to ERC7201 and is related on openzeppelin's role based access

@custom:function-name checkERC7201
 @dev a function used as a reference to test if the getERC7201 is working correctly
